definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: Most cases seldom present examples of absolutely perfect or totally flawed systems.
sentences.chinese: 大部份的个案鲜有绝对完美或一无可取的情况。

sentences.english: This MODL represents a transitional arrangement for that caseload.
sentences.chinese: 这个MODL代表了这批个案的过渡安排。

sentences.english: We report on an unusual case of penetrating tracheal injury caused by a needlefish.
sentences.chinese: 我们报告一个被针鱼刺伤穿通气管的罕见个案。

sentences.english: General out-patient attendances refer to cases seen by doctors.
sentences.chinese: 普通科门诊到诊人次指由医生诊治的个案。

sentences.english: In the same way, Chen Qubingas case study.
sentences.chinese: 本章选取陈去病作个案研究。

sentences.english: In rare cases, the intestine perforates and the infant dies.
sentences.chinese: 极少数的个案，出现肠道出现穿孔而导致死亡。

sentences.english: But the Chinese authorities, including Foreign Minister Yang, are dealing with this matter as an individual case.
sentences.chinese: 但是中国当局，包括杨外长，都把这事当作个案。

sentences.english: Shanxi confirmed human avian influenza cases, patients recovered and were discharged today.
sentences.chinese: 山西省确诊的人禽流感个案，患者于今日康复出院。

sentences.english: Lee and Hou's love tragedy in Peach Blossom Fan manifests unique characteristics and implication.
sentences.chinese: 《桃花扇》中侯李爱情悲剧有着独特的个案意义。

sentences.english: This is a case-study in the field of sociology .
sentences.chinese: 这是一项社会学的个案研究。

sentences.english: The existence ofsporting just cause shall be established on a case-by- case basis.
sentences.chinese: 正当的竞技理由是否成立，应结合个案具体分析。

sentences.english: Case studies can also be quite powerful in providing demonstrations that are counterexamples to theories.
sentences.chinese: 个案研究也能够给某一理论提供强有力的反例。

sentences.english: For the two written cases you should discuss the cases only within your group.
sentences.chinese: 有两个书面个案，你仅可以跟你同组的同学讨论。

sentences.english: Is there any seroconversion lasting more than a year and a half ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有一年半后血清转阳的个案？

sentences.english: Figures include a few cases where their parents had not yet decided whether their children would stay in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 数字包括少数父母未决定是否留居在港的个案。

sentences.english: Hong Kong in 1984, the first recorded AIDS cases.
sentences.chinese: 香港在1984年录得第一个艾滋病感染个案。

definition: to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
